title: Sardinia Waterfront Wellness Retreat in Alghero with Daily Breakfast
description:
Escape to waterfront serenity at this slice of Italian paradise overlooking Sardinia's Coral Bay. Just steps from Alghero's charming old town, you'll be perfectly placed to discover medieval treasures, towering sea walls and quaint boutiques. The town's unique Catalan influences make it a culture enthusiast's dream, while beach lovers will fall for the region's sandy coastlines.

Within the resort, treat yourself at the elevated spa, complete with Turkish baths, saunas and relaxation rooms, or simply lounge poolside with a cocktail in hand as you soak up the Mediterranean sun. Indulge in local and international delicacies at Del Emperador, or head straight into town to sample the finest local seafood and pasta.

title: Italian Seaside Elegance in Sardinia with Daily Breakfast, Free-Flow Drinks Hour & Spa Access
description:
Perched on a private promontory in the Gulf of Alghero, surrounded by endless shades of blue and green, this five-star retreat embodies the essence of Sardinia. Formerly a royal family residence until the 1940s, Villa Las Tronas exudes the timeless elegance of a regal hideaway.

Savour exquisite Mediterranean dining at Restaurant V, where fresh seasonal vegetables and seafood come together in a menu inspired by Sardinia’s rich culinary traditions. When you’re ready to explore, stroll through the ancient town of Alghero, visit nearby beaches or take a trip to the striking Neptune's caves.

Return to relax at the wellness centre, boasting a fitness area, massage and treatment rooms, sauna, Turkish bath and an indoor seawater pool. In the warmer months, the outdoor pool invites you to unwind while taking in breathtaking sea views.
